title: Buggy Sound
body: The champion select screen has  a lot of static, its fine if it's minimized, but when maximized its statics. All other instances are fine.

replies.body: That sounds bad, pun intended.  >.>  You could have a bad game file that can't play the effects, but other factors like outdated drivers could be involved.  My suggestion would be to run a repair through the client's setting guide to fix up any bad game files.  Also enable[ low-spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) in case your PC is getting stressed, and the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your drivers and pc.   Hopefully, those steps will get you squared away!
Ahhh, thank you the repair the client setting repair did the trick, it didn't tell me what was corrupted but fixed it nonetheless ty.
